alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 10 at 2:37PM AKST until February 11 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Northeast Gulf Coast including Yakutat. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A transition to rain is expected midday Friday with up to an inch of rain expected after that point. This could make snow removal difficult and make icy conditions on compacted snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area
